item.title: UI Development in Docker — Testing
item.description: This article is part of a series: UI Development in Docker — Basics UI Development in Docker — CI/CD UI Development in Docker — Testing Testing Locally and Visually For the best and safest results I use Chromium that runs in the local environment outside of the container.
